remarks: Value of a function given in maps-to notation.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
statement:
fvmptg.1 $e |- ( x = A -> B = C ) $.
fvmptg.2 $e |- F = ( x e. D |-> B ) $.
fvmptg $p |- ( ( A e. D /\ C e. R ) -> ( F ` A ) = C ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
